boxes.title: Visit your mining pool to know more
boxes.text: You get paid out based upon what the pool sets the min payout amount. A pool's min payout amount can vary from pool to pool. Click on the pool link to visit their website.

boxes.title: Learn more about BLOC
boxes.text: BLOC is a fast, easy to use and private decentralized cryptocurrency. Send money spacewide, worldwide or locally, immediately and without costly intermediaries using the blockchain technology.

boxes.title: Everything BLOC in one place
boxes.text: Affiliation, Airdrop missions, all the latest informations about BLOC concentrated in one place to make it easier. Discover the BLOC Dashboard

boxes.title: Join our amazing community.
boxes.text: BLOC is nothing without it's amazing and friendly community. Come and socialise with us on the Telegram Chanel and Discord.

boxes.title: Trading BLOC on exchange
boxes.text:
Buy and Sell BLOC on one of two official exchanges:
  • - Stex
  • - TradeOgre

boxes.title: Follow BLOC on social media
boxes.text: We are updating all our social network regulary, the best way to stay updated with BLOC is to follow us on Medium, Twitter, Facebook, Youtube and Instagram

boxes.title: Download BLOC iPhone & iPad application
boxes.text: Introducing the first BLOC Wallet for iOS with a focus on accessibility, security and simplicity. BLOC Wallet makes getting started with BLOC easier than ever.

boxes.title: Do you need more help ?
boxes.text: If this is your first time hearing about BLOC, we recommend starting by visiting the official BLOC.MONEY website but also the BLOC Wiki where you can read precious informations. You can also join BLOC Discord. We and the community will be happy to help you.

boxes.title: Don't forget to sleep mine !
boxes.text: An easy way to mine BLOC with your smartphone and make a passive income while you are sleeping! Watch the video and start sleep mining today!

boxes.title: BLOC Ecosystem
boxes.text: One of our main goal is to provide a cryptocurrency which is safe, easy to use and attractive combined with a powerful ecosystem for users, to benefits advantages from multiple type of industries like never done before.

boxes.title: Visit your mining pool to know more
boxes.text: You get paid out based upon what the pool sets the min payout amount. A pool's min payout amount can vary from pool to pool. Click on the pool link to visit their website.

boxes.title: Learn more about Turtlecoin
boxes.text: TurtleCoin is a fast, easy and private cryptocurrency which allows you to send money to friends and businesses.

boxes.title: TurtleCoin as a Service
boxes.text: Build on-chain apps in an easy, fun and fast way on the TRTL Network. Integrate TRTL Services easily with your application or game with our RESTful API and push notfication system.

boxes.title: Join our amazing community.
boxes.text: TurtleCoin is nothing without it's amazing and friendly community. Come and socialise with us on the Subreddit and Discord. Join us and let's talk!

boxes.title: Buy and sell TRTL on exchange
boxes.text:
Buy and Sell TurtleCoin on one of the three official exchanges:
  • - Bilaxy
    • - Trade Satoshi
  • - TradeOgre

boxes.title: Follow TurtleCoin on social media
boxes.text: We are updating all our social network regulary, the best way to stay updated with TurtleCoin is to follow us on Medium, Twitter, Facebook Group and Instagram

boxes.title: Fun, Fast, & Easy Crypto Payments
boxes.text: The goal of the TurtlePay™ project is to provide an easy to use, integrate, and maintain Payment Gateway for the TurtleCoin™ network.

boxes.title: Do you need more help ?
boxes.text: If this is your first time hearing about TurtleCoin, we recommend starting with the TurtleCoin website but also the TurtleCoin GitHub where you can find precious informations.
